definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: There are beautiful prose poetry offered in our Prose and Poetry section.
sentences.chinese: 在“散文詩”這個欄目裏有許多美妙的散文詩提供。

sentences.english: I remember when I went and I had a great time.
sentences.chinese: 我記得我讀大學的時候度過了一段美妙的時光。

sentences.english: Darling, that was wonderful for you.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，對你來說那是美妙的。

sentences.english: Often I used to await there a moment of exceptional beauty.
sentences.chinese: 我往往在那兒佇足到那異常美妙的一刻。

sentences.english: Sounds, like singing birds, meowing cats, buzzing bees, beeping horns, musical instruments, ringing bells, and much more, are all around us.
sentences.chinese: 我們能夠聽到更多的所有環繞在我們身邊的美妙聲音。

sentences.english: She throbbed at the happy thought.
sentences.chinese: 這個美妙的想法讓她感到興奮。

sentences.english: So wonderful and deep relaxing meditation.
sentences.chinese: 如此美妙及深入放鬆的入靜。

sentences.english: You're a goddam swordboat captain! Is there any thing better in the world?
sentences.chinese: 你是一船之長，世上還有比這更美妙的景象嗎？

sentences.english: But can convey with the character only, we should defend that adorably .
sentences.chinese: 但只能用文字表達的，我們要把那塊美妙守住。

sentences.english: Take a deep breath and feel the beauty of language with heart. Look, you can do it!
sentences.chinese: 深呼一口氣，用心感受語言的美妙，瞧，你也能行。
有人陪同生活纔會更美妙。

sentences.english: That's the beauty of event processing.
sentences.chinese: 這就是事件處理的美妙之處。

sentences.english: Duan Linxi is famous for her beautiful songs, in the super girl this year.
sentences.chinese: 在幾年的快樂女生中，段林希以她美妙的歌聲而出名。

sentences.english: But it's wonderful to contemplate this cluster of stars on a winter night.
sentences.chinese: 但在冬夜，注視這個星團顯得如此美妙。

sentences.english: I was deeply touched to receive your wonderful letter and The Butterfly Lovers cd.
sentences.chinese: 收到你們美妙的信和《梁祝》的唱片，我深受感動。

sentences.english: In spite of my wonderful cheating techniques, I flunck math.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我有美妙的作弊技巧，我的數學還是被當掉了。

definition: warms the heart and delights the eye (idiom)/pleasing/delightful
